direction.raw_text: . FOREST FLOOR - DAY. 1 Winter. Silence on the forest floor. Snow falling. Then the sound of breathing. The soft footfall of a person running.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fourteen years old, long hair, eyes like blue ice, glides through the trees, a bow strapped to her shoulder. She is dressed in animal skins and fur shoes. She blends almost completely into the landscape of trees and snow. She stops dead. Her breath visible in the freezing air. Suddenly alert, she has spotted her prey. A REINDEER nuzzling the snow, trying to unearth a patch of grass to eat. Its head pops up - danger. Too late. The sudden swoosh and the snap of an arrow piercing its skin. The deer flops to the ground with a thud. It whines, its feet dig at the earth. Its mouth gnaws at the icy air. Steam pouring from its nostrils.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches, removes a fur glove. She bends to her knees. She reaches out and gently pets the animals frightened face. She runs her hand down along its neck, in towards the wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just missed your heart. She stands and pulls out an old pistol from her waist holster. She fires two shots directly at CAMERA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : HANNA 2 EXT. FOREST FLOOR - LATER. 2 A knife enters the deer near its anus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remove the penis and scrotum, make a deep, circular cut around the rectum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pulls the knife up towards the brisket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (WHISPER) Cut from the rear to the brisket. She works calmly without expression.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST FLOOR - LATER 3 The deer lies on it's side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: breaths hard. She reaches deep into the body cavity and pulls out intestine, stomach, liver. She freezes, sensing danger. Her hand deep inside the animal. She listens. She looks out into the still forest. No sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: mid forties, a mammoth with leathery face, stands behind her like a ghost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're dead. Right now. I've killed you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: spins spraying deer-blood on to the snow and brings her fist right to ERIK's face. He blocks and thumps an open palm on to HANNA's shoulder sending her sprawling into the snow. She leaps to her feet, as ERIK aims a kick at her head. She dodges, punches below his knee cap, and goes for her pistol. ERIK slaps the hand away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Use your hands! She goes for the gun again and again he stops her. He moves in tight, pulling the gun from its holster and tossing it deep into the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: clips ERIK'S temple sending him to the ground. She wraps her arms around his neck preparing to snap... ... but she can't. He throws her over his shoulder into a pile of snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands and wipes the snow from his pants. His face shows a touch of frustration. He plods into the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drag it back yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drags herself to the deer's side. She stares at its dead face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST FLOOR - LATER 4 HANNA clears the kill site. Wipes the last dots of blood on to a stick. No sign she was ever there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST FLOOR - EVENING 5 HANNA drags the 200 lb deer on a makeshift sled. She lifts her knees high and moves at a steady pace. Hidden among the trees, a little way off, ERIK is watching her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN. NORTH SWEDISH FOREST - EVENING 6 A log cabin built around an ancient tree surrounded by the thick forest. HANNA is standing in the snow, stripping the deer with a knife. It's a tough job but she does it no fuss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - EVENING 7 Almost everything ERIK and HANNA own they've made themselves using what can be found in the forest. What few possessions that have been brought in from the outside world are old and worn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is making a fire using a bow drill. The friction of the drill produces an ember which HANNA carefully transfers to some dried leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - LATER 8 HANNA and ERIK sit either side of a small fire, still dressed in furs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: swirls a spoon around in a dish of stew. ERIK takes a mouthful, watches HANNA not eating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? Are you hurt? She keeps swirling her spoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were half asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do better next time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: German.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (In German w/ English
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do better next time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Italian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (In Italian w/ English
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do better next time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spanish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: studies her food and slowly takes a spoonful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (INSISTENT) Spanish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (In Spanish w/ English
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you really want me to snap your neck? He looks at her - drops the quiz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much did you pull off the deer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hundred and twenty with scraps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About 200 pounds in total?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That explains it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you beat me. You're getting strong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: almost blushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands to put his bowl away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (In Spanish w/ English
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you didn't snap my neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S ROOM. LOG CABIN - NIGHT 9 HANNA is in bed under fur covers listening while ERIK reads to her from an old encyclopedia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Great Blue Whale is the largest animal to have ever existed. A blue whale's tongue weighs over two and a half tons and its mouth is large enough to hold 90 tons of food and water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's bigger than the cabin. Its heart weighs thirteen hundred pounds and a male has seven gallons of testicles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: smirks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Blue Whale's "music" can be heard for over 500 miles. He shuts the book.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time for sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night. He stands by her bed looking down at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you forget something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: takes HANNA'S gun out of his pocket and puts it on the table next to her bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night. He walks to the door. HANNA stops him with a question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's music like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's difficult to explain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try. He opens the encyclopedia again, leafs through the pages and reads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a Music. A combination of sounds with a view to beauty of form and expression of emotion'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But how does it feel? Erik is not equipped to answer such esoteric questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. It feels good. It's, uh, nice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me properly. Can you play music?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mother could. She used to sing very well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to hear it for myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will soon enough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How soon? Erik looks away from her questioning eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you're ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm ready. I'm ready already. They look at each other- he weighs it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just go to sleep now. I'll see you in the morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Hanna covers herself in an animal skin as ERIK pulls a wattle screen across her bed, strokes her hair gently for a moment and leaves the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reaches under her bed and takes out an old battered photograph, taken 15 years ago, of a YOUNG WOMAN with eyes like hers - her MOTHER, JOANNA ZADEK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - MORNING 10 The morning sunlight slants through the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is walking through the trees. He stops, raises his pistol at a tree trunk some distance away and fires. The tree breaks apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S ROOM. LOG CABIN - MORNING 11 HANNA wakes with the sound of the GUNSHOT. She is still holding her mothers photgraph.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pushes the photograph under her mattress and climbs out of bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN. SHOOTING RANGE - MORNING 12 Another GUNSHOT breaks a tree apart. Hanna fires. Another tree breaks apart. She rolls and fires. She rolls and fires. She reloads. And fires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - DAY 13 HANNA attacks ERIK. Hand. Knee. Elbow. Fist. He defends easily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again. They reset. She repeats the motion. Hand. Knee. Elbow. Fist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again. Hand. Knee. Elbow. Fist. She's getting faster. Her strikes are solid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - DAY 14 A medium size log nailed along two pillars of the cabin acts as a chin-up bar. Erik and Hanna do chin-ups. Both are fit. Neither will give up. ERIK observing HANNA's power. Both have the sense that he is judging her. HANNA's face fiercely determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - DAY 15 ERIK and HANNA sit with their backs to a tree in the huge forest as they breathlessly recover from the exhaustion of the exercise. HANNA speaks fast, reciting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I live in Leipzig. German city. Population 0.7 Million people. We live at Number 7 Weissingerplatz. I go to school at the Klaus Kohle Gymnasium and my best friends are Rudi Gunter and Clara Schliess. I like literature and sport, in particular tennis and athletics. I have a dog called Trudi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NORTH SWEDISH FOREST - DAY 16 HANNA is running, racing ERIK. Fierce determination, almost anger in her eyes. They reach the river and dive in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RIVER - DAY. 17 HANNA and ERIK are swimming hard against the current of the fast-flowing river, working at full pelt just to stay still. They swim and swim, their muscles busting, their lungs bursting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't give up! Don't give up! HANNA's arms flails as she fights against the stream and she screams in pain. She is grabbed under by the undertow and is pulled downwards. For a second she is underwater and in darkness but ERIK's hand pulls her back up and she breaks the surface with a gasp of relief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NORTH SWEDISH FOREST. RIVER BANK. 18 On the bank, HANNA climbs out. ERIK approaches her but moodily, even angrily, she pushes him away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't need your help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Her face sullen, she walks away into the forest. He stares after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN - NIGHT 19 Outside, ERIK stands alone, thinking. An OWL swoops down to catch a mouse then flies back up into the tree tops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN. HANNA'S ROOM - NIGHT. 20 HANNA is asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: enters the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches the bed, and solemnly takes out a pistol and aims it at HANNA. He is tense with expectation. Suddenly HANNA bursts from her covers, smashes the pistol from ERIK's hand and smashes him down on to the bed. She grabs the pistol and points it at his face. She is alert, eyes intense, face proud. She speaks quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm ready now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: relaxes. It's a false beat. He lunges again at her, really violently. He seems to be really trying to hurt her. But HANNA has reached under her mattress and there is a flint knife - in an instant it is at ERIK's neck. She pricks his neck slightly. It bleeds just slightly. Stillness and silence. HANNA breathless, angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't tell me you had a knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told me to think for myself. Isn't that what you want? She is angry for the first time. ERIK does not answer. Just stares at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to see things. I can't stay here forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - NIGHT 21 ERIK takes long lunging strides straight out from the cabin. He counts his paces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One, two, three, four...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST FLOOR - DAY 22 ERIK and HANNA are racing through the forest. Over this we continue to hear ERIK counting his paces from the previous scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) ...five, six, seven, eight...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - NIGHT 23 ERIK ...nine, ten. After 10 paces, ERIK makes a 90 degree turn and enters the tree line. The snow and mud crunch under his boots. We continue to inter-cut the following with more close-ups of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: training: climbing, fighting, chin-ups, shooting. All the while we continue to hear ERIK counting out his paces. After 40 paces, with the cabin light distant, ERIK falls to his knees. He unsheathes a large knife and jams it into the frozen earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NORTH SWEDISH FOREST - MORNING 24 HANNA comes out of the cabin, rubbing her eyes and yawning, eating a hunk of cold meat. She looks up to see a snow fox staring at her from the tree line. She crouches and holds out what's left of her breakfast. The fox approaches gingerly, delicately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello little foxy... foxy loxy... come on... come and share my breakfast. The fox comes to her and nervously accepts the scrap, withdrawing a few feet to eat it. HANNA shuffles forward carefully and gently pats the snow fox - it is only a cub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . As the fox eats it makes low grunting noises which HANNA expertly mimics - causing the fox to look up, puzzled - they seem to have a genuine connection - as if they've done this before. Suddenly the snow fox freezes, pricks up its ears, looks up,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks up too. An aeroplane is approaching overhead. The fox darts back into the undergrowth as the roar of the plane reverberates through the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: jumps to her feet and with incredible speed and dexterity climbs to the very top of a near by tree. The plane roars over her head and disappears over the snowy wilderness, oblivious to HANNA'S tiny presence. It's only now that we see the full extent of HANNA'S isolation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN - MORNING. 25 HANNA enters breathless with excitement. ERIK sits pensively with his back to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see it? Wasn't it beautiful, like thunder. I had to stick my fingers in my ears it was so loud. Did you hear it? She stops, sensing ERIK'S mood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? Sitting in front of ERIK is a metal case, caked with frozen dirt. ERIK pops open the case. Inside a tangle of technology.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks at the case, mesmerized.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does it do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It tells Marissa Wiegler where we are. He looks at her, a hint of a challenge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you want to leave here all you have to do is flip that switch. She approaches the box and places a single finger on the small red switch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But once it's done, there'll be no going back. She'll never give up until you're dead, or she is. You understand? I wont be there to hold your hand. So be sure. Be sure it's what you really want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not scaring me. He looks at her disbelievingly. She shakes her head in protest, but simultaneously moves away from the switch. He softens towards her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's here. There's no rush. Take your time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns her back on the box, but can't help taking another look at it over her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN. HANNA'S ROOM - NIGHT 26 HANNA is under the covers again while ERIK reads more from the encyclopedia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laika, a mongrel dog from the streets of Moscow, was the first animal to orbit the Earth. She was launched into outer space on the third of November, 1957. Scientists believed humans would be unable to survive conditions of outer space, so flights by animals were viewed as an experimental precursor to human missions. Her rocket was not designed to be retrievable, and Laika had always been intended to die.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: awkwardly turns the page to change subject.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When a star collapses the supernova explosion is 10 billion times brighter than other stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shuts her eyes and tries to imagine how bright that might be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - MORNING 27 ERIK straps the bow to his chest and grabs a quiver of bolts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you hunt with me? Hanna is sweeping the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's up to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: eyes the box sitting open, it's waiting for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll stay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: leaves abruptly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: continues to sweep the ground, her movements bring her closer to the metal box. She stops sweeping and looks at the box. She turns and walks out of the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - CONTINUOUS 28 HANNA comes out of the cabin and sits down on a tree trunk. She sees the snow fox cub but says nothing. It comes over and noses around the cabin, but HANNA'S mind is elsewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering to herself) Marissa Wiegler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - CONTINUOUS 29 CLOSE ON - the metal box, the switch catches the light from the door as HANNA enters to confront it. The room is still and quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches the metal box and slowly reaches out her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come and find me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON - She flips the switch, a little red light begins to flash. An ALARM CLOCK begins to ring as we cut to -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARISSA'S APARTMENT. VIRGINIA. USA - EARLY MORNING 30 CLOSE ON - a bedside alarm clock ringing loudly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a handsome woman in her mid-40's with red hair, reaches over and slams the alarm clock off. She's alone in her bed. She always is. She has no children. She's made choices in her life and lives without looking back. She walks into her ensuite bathroom and looks at herself in the mirror. She collects her toothbrush and bares her teeth in a snarl as she brushes them. Her gums bleed a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - EVENING 31 HANNA tends to boiling pots. She's cooking a feast. ERIK enters. He stamps his feet shedding ice at the door. He walks by the box and sees the little red light flickering on. HANNA sees this and sees him smile, but she knows he's sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were lucky to grab that deer. There was nothing out there today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks over at the meal HANNA is preparing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smells good. He wraps an arm around her shoulder. They don't hug much and it shows. HANNA is almost defensive and tense. And then the hug is over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CIA HQ LANGLEY VIRGINIA - DAY 32 MARISSA, wearing a sharp business suit, drives a black Acura into her designated spot in the CIA HQ's car park. As she gets out, we see the parking space is designated for
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Her young male PA and TECH ONE are already waiting for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ma'am. We've had a signal reported by Interpol. We think it's Eric Heller. An unusual expression of shock on MARISSA'S face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well I'll be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It seems he's in Sweden. Jokkmokk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: miles out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck is he doing there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Living in the middle of nowhere, like the frigging Una Bomber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The son of a bitch. Sweden? Sweden?! The PA hands her a coffee and she hands him some files.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Apparently he turned on his locator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not an idiot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know... I mean I believe so. But that's what happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After 14 years in Jokkmokk, maybe he'd rather go to prison.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN - NIGHT 33 ERIK is leaning over a pail of water, cutting his beard off with a knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Eric Heller. From the Czech Republic. I recruited him in 1991 when they were all joining the Velvet Revolution and sticking it to the commies
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: now clean shaven, opens a wooden case in the corner of the room and takes out an old folded three piece suit and rolled shirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) He couldn't wait to kiss some yankee butt and make some bucks doing our dirty work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: awkwardly begins to change into the suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VIDEO CONFERENCE ROOM, LANGLEY. 34 MARISSA sits in a video conference room surrounded by worried looking faces, with her are her close advisors WALT and BOB. She's also speaking into a microphone on the table in front of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trouble was he had his own way of doing things. Kinda paranoid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fires up a computer screen and logs on. He uses an access code. This takes him to a new file. He enters the tracking device number. A name comes up. ERIK HELLER. He clicks on a link. HELLER's face pops on to the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a team player. Not a ajoiner.a He became increasingly isolated and disturbed. Kept mouthing off about classified programmes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: clicks on a link to a newspaper article which comes on to the screen: The headline: POLICE HUNT FOR MURDER SUSPECT. A picture of Heller in the article and a smashed car on a rural road. The two men stare at his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I kept warning and he kept getting worse. In the summer of 1995 he took his girlfriend, Johanna Zadek, on a trip to the Baltic coast and blew her head off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hits a new link: A still of the same young woman as the photo HANNA was previously looking at in her bedroom. Her name printed below it: JOHANNA ZADEK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never heard from him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anybody know why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe the pressure got to him, Bob. You know what that's like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: comes from the speaker, this is LEWIS but we don't see him yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) What do you want us to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bring him in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean? Call the police,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Walt. This is exactly the kind of shit we can't have out there anymore. He was one of ours, we trained him. He kills some other poor woman and it's a cluster fuck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell it to Interpol. Let them pick him up. Try him for murder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's right. This has nothing to do with us. I don't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to. I'm making the call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and WALT exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Gentlemen. That'll be all. The video screen flickers off, people take their files and start to leave. MARISSA WIEGLER stands in the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S ROOM. LOG CABIN - CONTINUOUS 35 HANNA sits in her bed reading her encyclopaedia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: dressed incongruously in the suit and tie, enters and sits on the edge of her bed. She doesn't look up from her book. His face shows more emotion than we've seen before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanna...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks up, still trying to hide her fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me again?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marissa Weigler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Postcard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The address where we meet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wilhelm Grimm's house. Stephanstrasse 260. 10559, Berlin. Germany.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moves a strand of hair from HANNA'S forehead and looks at her with paternal care.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night my sweet girl. He stands and quietly goes to the door when her voice stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father... He turns to look at her, both their eyes full of trepidation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can do this. You're ready. Just remember what I've taught you. She smiles reassuringly at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see you there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN. NORTH SWEDISH FOREST - NIGHT. 36 ERIK comes out of the cabin carrying a small rucksack. He closes the door behind him and takes a deep breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S ROOM. LOG CABIN - CONTINUOUS 37 HANNA gets out of bed and goes to the small window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She watches as ERIK walks away from the cabin for the last time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EDGE OF NORTH SWEDISH FOREST. NIGHT. 38 Dusk in the forest as the flickering sun goes down. As peaceful a place as you could imagine. A calm blueness of impending night on the snow. Then a series of ropes break the top frame and FIFTY US SPECIAL FORCES dressed in white snow gear silently abseil down to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S ROOM. LOG CABIN - NIGHT 39 HANNA is doing push-ups on her bedroom floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST/CABIN - NIGHT 40 Infra-red POV as the SPECIAL OPS TEAM head through the forest wearing night vision-goggles. The Leader of the Operation follows the tracker signal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this guy one of ours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Used to be. Tread carefully, he's been in there a long time, he's damaged goods, and he knows we're coming. We see through the infra-red vision the endless trees in the pitch blackness. The SPECIAL OPS FORCES get closer. They see the cabin in the night. They approach. Silence in the darkness. Just the breathing of men in the icy cold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S ROOM. LOG CABIN - NIGHT 41 HANNA stops her push-ups, sensing the SPECIAL FORCES approach. She silently springs to her feet and moves to the front of the cabin. She looks out and sees shadows moving among the trees. She turns and presses herself against the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOG CABIN. NORTH SWEDISH FOREST - NIGHT 42 The HEAD OF OPS waves TWO SPECIAL OPERATIVES forward. The rest of the forces surround the cabin, but at a distance. The two men approach the cabin. One opens the door and the other steps in. Then the first follows close behind. Both are engulfed by darkness. The rest of the forces wait in silence for a radio signal. The HEAD of SPECIAL OPS looses patience and picks up the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullum? Do you read me? No response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I repeat, do you read me? The HEAD of OPS waves all thirty of his men closer to the cabin. Guns at the ready. The HEAD of OPS and five other men storm the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CABIN DINING AREA. 43 Through night vision we see the cabin interior. Then the two
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: dead on the floor. Necks broken. Then find HANNA sitting quietly, looking timid and unsure. Just a little girl, her eyes shining in the dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LANGLEY. VIRGINIA. 44 MARISSA is walking through long concrete corridor as her phone rings. She answers quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Ma'am, this is Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: affects a abusiness as usuala tone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) The target escaped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did that happen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) We're thinking maybe he got away in the snow, in the thick snow, or... But he's in the wind and I have two men down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find him, Lewis. Find him and take him out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ma'am. There's more. They found a child, his daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns pale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. HOLDING CELL. 45 ON CLOSED CIRCUIT TELEVISION: A cement box. HANNA lies on a small bed. Not moving. Two American voices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She hasn't moved since we brought her in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has anyone talked to her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They want a psych evaluation before they interrogate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL. 46 HANNA lies on the cot. She's been cleaned up and is wearing an army regulation jump suit. The metal door drags open. A Doctor, BURTON, closes the door behind him. He walks up to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello Hanna. Hanna lies motionless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Dr. Burton. Would you like to talk to me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: voice has been trained to engender a state of peace and security. HANNA sits up and hangs her legs off the side of the cot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was told by my father to gain the upper hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really. Interesting. What else did your father tell you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where am I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're in holding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This must all be very strange for you. You've been in the forest a long time. But I want you to know no one's going to hurt you. We just want to talk to you about your father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: seems to be staring up at the ceiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanna? He follows her eye-line to the CCTV camera above them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that a camera?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, yes, that's a camera. To keep a record.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Camera obscura, it's Latin for "dark chamber".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM. 47 LEWIS sits with the MONITOR, watching HANNA watching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plug the CCTV through to Langley. Extension 247.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: presses some buttons as LEWIS calls on his phone and speaks into it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should have visual on the psych evaluation now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OBS ROOM. LANGLEY HQ. NIGHT. CONT. 48 MARISSA, alone in a Langley OBS ROOM. No one else there. Late at night in America. Something secret about Marissa here. On the screen she sees HANNA in the Interrogation Room. Her screen tells she is watching CAMP G - Interrogation Room 3.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watches HANNA intently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was first described by the Arabic scientist Ibn Alhazen in the year 1021.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's she saying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Gobbledygook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OBS ROOM. LANGLEY HQ. NIGHT. CONT. 49 MARISSA stares at her screen, at the blank face of the fourteen year old HANNA. Focus in on MARISSA's face as she studies this strange young woman. The sense that MARISSA knows more about this girl than she is letting on. On the screen BURTON continues to probe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I get you something? What do you like? Music? Magazines? Just say. Anything at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 50 HANNA leans forward. Looks at BURTON, who encourages her with his eyes. She whispers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to speak to Marissa Wiegler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OBS ROOM. LANGLEY - CONTINUOUS 51 MARISSA sits in stunned silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Did you hear that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pauses before she answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell her I'll be there tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. MILITARY LABORATORY. 52 A white space with specialist lighting and the hum of specialised air pressurizes. A protected environment - this is the DNA lab. A MILITARY DOCTOR is looking at the result of something on a computer. It has shocked and intrigued him. He calls across to another doctor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John come and take a look at this kid's blood sample.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 2 walks across. He sees the sample on the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Is that right? That can't be right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I got a sample of her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 2 looks at the results, baffled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That must be contamination.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What contamination? What would it be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run it again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL. 53 HANNA is sitting on her cot with her back against the wall. A metal door drags open. A pair of smart female shoes enter the room, accompanied by the military boots of two guards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.C.) My name is Marissa Wiegler. You wanted to speak to me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns to look. It is a completely different woman, dressed in similar clothes to MARISSA but not her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stares at her, then looks at the two guards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the guards) You can wait outside. The guards exit and the door slams shut behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM. DAY. CONT. 54 In the Observation Room LEWIS is looking at a small Monitor. He speaks into a consoles microphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should have visual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CIA LANGLEY OPERATIONAL HQ. EARLY DAWN. CONT. 55 MARISSA WIEGLER sits alone in the empty CIA Langley headquarters, watching the CCTV relay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Where am I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 56 HANNA stares at FALSE MARISSA awaiting an answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're in a safe place. Let's talk about your father. You must love him very much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you meet him? The false MARISSA pauses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OPERATIONAL HQ. LANGLEY - CONTINUOUS 57 MARISSA hears the question. Thinks fast, her mind totally focussed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell her it was by a news kiosk in Alexanderplatz, East Berlin. Say it was raining.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 58 FALSE MARISSA pauses looking at HANNA. We see that she has a tiny microphone in her ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At a news kiosk. Alexanderplatz. In the rain. She smiles reassuringly. HANNA nods, looking at FALSE MARISSA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM - CONTINUOUS 59 LEWIS watches on the screen. But then gets a call from the Military Laboratory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir we need to talk to you. We've run tests on the girl. His voice sounds urgent, concerned. But Marissa has interrupted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) What tests? As the argument continues, we see and hear on the screen the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: continuing to talk to HANNA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know where your father is? In the OBS room LEWIS, half watching the screen, explains to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on intercom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Standard DNA and meds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OPERATIONAL HQ. LANGLEY - CONTINUOUS 60 MARISSA, alone in Langley, suddenly alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Send the results straight to me. On the screen FALSE MARISSA is talking to HANNA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did he tell you where he was going? We're all worried about him. On the CCTV Hanna looks at the FALSE MARISSA. She begins to cry, holds out her arms to be held.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM - CONTINUOUS 61 The MONITOR sees her cry and turns to LEWIS who is still half- embroiled in the tests discussion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks at HANNA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 62 The FALSE MARISSA tentatively takes HANNA in her arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's OK. It's OK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: coils her thin arms around the FALSE MARISSA'S neck, clinging to her like a monkey. The FALSE MARISSA looks up to the security camera, slightly concerned. Hanna wriggles in her arms, to get a better grip...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OPERATIONAL HQ. LANGLEY - CONTINUOUS 63 MARISSA watches this strange image of her false self hugging this young girl. HANNA begins to weep more and more, burrowing her face into the FALSE MARISSA. On the CCTV we hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) You want me to give her something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 64 HANNA clutching on to FALSE MARISSA, nestles close, weeping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it might be necessary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OPERATIONAL HQ. LANGLEY. CONT. 65 MARISSA watches, now concerned. Something is wrong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get her out of there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORRIDOR OUTSIDE HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 66 Burton comes rushing down the corridor filling a syringe as he goes. He arrives at HANNA'S door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open up. The first guard opens HANNA'S door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Abort. I repeat. Abort.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANNA'S HOLDING CELL - CONTINUOUS 67 Hanna hugs, weeping, on to the FALSE MARISSA. BURTON hears the instruction to abort but too late... ...as suddenly and with total efficiency HANNA SNAPS the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: MARISSA's neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OPERATIONAL HQ. LANGLEY. DAY. CONT. 68 MARISSA stares in shock as her false self slumps dead to the floor. Then she watches as HANNA grabs the first GUARDS handgun from his holster and fires two rounds into Burton's skull. And two more into the first GUARD's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM. CONT. 69 LEWIS immediately presses the Alarm Bell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jee-sus wept! On another screen LEWIS watches as the other Guard tries to drag the metal door shut. He hits a fleshy door jam - Burton. Hanna is upon him. Two shots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LANGLEY. OPERATIONAL HQ. CONT. 70 MARISSA watches HANNA aim straight at camera. HANNA'S fierce eyes looking at her, MARISSA cant help but pull away from the screen. HANNA fires and the screen goes blank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM. CONT. 71 LEWIS watches as, one after another, his camera's go down. But still there's no sign of HANNA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a child for Christsake!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. CORRIDOR IN SECURE BRIEFING AREA. 72 Alarms are sounding and red lights flashing in the corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: walks fast along the corridor. She ducks into a door to avoid two Centre Guards running past, dives down another corridor and walks through a pair of double doors with warning signs on them. PROTECTED ENVIRONMENT - CLASSIFIED PROGRAMME.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. MILITARY LABORATORY. CONT. 73 She finds herself in the specialist Military DNA Laboratory. The MILITARY DOCTORS stare at her. One of them reaches for an alarm but HANNA is too fast. She flies across the desk and smashing a glass test tube, she cuts the doctor's neck, then turns and does the same to the other one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks round, trying to find a way out. Then she sees something on the desk. It is a file with a photo of herself clipped to it and a collection of papers - she scans it and reads in several places the letters aDNA.a But before she has time to read properly, she hears a female voice from outside the lab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Sanders. I'm checking Zone eleven. The FEMALE GUARD radios off, then enters. She senses something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: SANDERS - The DNA laboratory suddenly seems empty. The buzz of the lab's lighting and the whir of the air- pressurizes are the only sounds as the GUARD looks around. Then the GUARD hears a rustling from behind her and tenses up. She turns around but HANNA has vanished into thin air, there is silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. CORRIDOR IN SECURE BRIEFING CENTRE. 74 HANNA, runs along the corridor. She has in her hands the DNA results which she scrunches up and jams into a pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. AIR-CONDITIONING DUCT ABOVE CORRIDOR. CONT. 75 HANNA eyes the vent above her. She peers around a corner - her only other route of escape and sees:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. CORRIDOR. CONT. 76 MILITARY PERSONNEL reach the intersection close to HANNA and spread out, all going in different directions but none coming towards her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The last pair of personnel start heading towards her. She looks up at the duct again and a length of ducting along the wall, about waist height. She puts a foot on a rail, halls herself up towards the vent. She fiddles with the vent, eventually opening it as the personnel are almost upon her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. AIR-CONDITIONING VENT. CONT. 77 She crawls through the narrow air-conditioning duct. She stops, alert to the sounds beneath her. Through small perforations in a vent she sees more MILITARY PERSONNEL running down the corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. AIR-CONDITIONING DUCT ABOVE CORRIDOR. CONT. 78 The duct bends to a vertical angle. She begins to crawl up a steep gradient towards a crack of light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. OBSERVATION ROOM. 79 LEWIS sits in silence. MONITOR looks at him nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think she's out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She can't get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: picks up an internal telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (INTO TELEPHONE) Who's on the perimeter? Detail every unit available.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP G. AIR-CONDITIONING VENT. CONT. 80 HANNA is sweating, exhausted, blinking in the darkness, trying to make out what the light source is. The gradient has got steeper and she starts to slide backwards on the smooth metal surface. She digs her fingers into the rivets joining the plates of stainless steel, trying to get a purchase. She summons the last of her strength and reaches a crest. She rests a moment, then hauls herself over the crest and immediately starts sliding... she tumbles, gathering pace, falling down a long chute into the blackness. She has no idea where she is or what's happening, but she's covering a lot of ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She hits the bottom with a crunch and cries out. When she opens her eyes she sees more tunnel - and at the end light. She crawls quickly towards it and stops at a kind of manhole cover with a sprung lever - she wrenches the lever and pushes against it. After a little effort the cover gives way and light floods in, blinding her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: recovers and tentatively pokes her head out into:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOROCCO/DESERT. CONT. 81 BLAZING SUN - HANNA's pale face appears, eyes crinkled shut. Wider - HANNA emerges from a hole in the ground in the middle of a sandblasted desert and slams the cover closed. Total silence now, except for the whistle of the wind on sand. It takes her eyes a moment to adjust to the blinding light. Blearily she looks out across this alien environment. After a moment her ears prick up. She turns just in time to see a column of Military Jeeps rise over a sand dune in the distance behind her. The jeeps are crawling straight towards her, ominously shimmering in the desert heat. She quickly ducks back down into her rabbit hole and waits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOROCCAN DESERT 82 In the middle of the desert the soldiers convene, looking for
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A military truck is stationery. Nothing around for miles. We hear a military voice on a radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are you receiving me? Can you confirm your position. Subject has escaped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOROCCAN DESERT. DAY. 83 The truck moves off a short distance and stops again. Meanwhile a large convoy of Military Vehicles passes right over HANNA. When it has past she sees the first vehicle crawling to a halt right near the hole - just yards away. One of the MILITARY PERSONNEL in the jeep gets out and goes over to the hole, lifts the lid, inspects the darkness. The Truck radio is on and we hear the voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you confirm your position 473? Banks? Banks can you hear me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Once BANKS is satisfied he walks away a few paces, gets out a pair of high powered binoculars, looks this way and that. He walks up a dune and scans the dunes with his binoculars. Finally he walks back and climbs into the Jeep, gets on the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . I'm at a perimeter opening at the far east wing. Something's not quite right... He doesn't notice but the lid is open now and the air- conditioning duct is empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the Jeep moves off we see HANNA is clinging to the axle, hanging upside down underneath. Her face is pressed to the oily metal, her back just an inch from the desert floor flashing beneath her. The jeeps now take a track along the edge of a steep dune.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: takes her chance and lets go of her grip. She clenches her eyes shut as the jeep passes over her. As soon as the jeeps clears she rolls herself over the edge of the dune.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rolls down the sand dune at speed until finally she slows and stops. She lies still and shocked by the quiet as the Jeep disappears into the distance. Then she sits up and looks around herself. She has no conception of this landscape, no idea where she might be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARISSA'S APARTMENT. VIRGINIA. USA - NIGHT 84 MARISSA moves between her wardrobe and a suitcase packing clothes, underwear, another power suit. Fully packed she goes to the back of the wardrobe and pulls aside some dresses to reveal a hidden safe. She keys in the security code, the safe door opens and from the back of the safe Marissa retrieves a blue file.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks at the files title in large blunt letters:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FOREST ROAD - FLASHBACK 85 FLASHBACK to 1995. A much younger MARISSA watching a very fast-moving car on a deserted forest road. She takes from her pocket a small detonating device and as the car approaches a bend, presses it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . There is a small explosion and the car swerves off the road and smashes headlong into a post. The horn starts to blare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches the car. The road is empty. MARISSA looks through binoculars at the car. She sees a woman, on the passenger side, head thrust forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Blood everywhere. MARISSA shoots her in the head just to be sure. But the driver's seat is empty. MARISSA stops dead. Then the back door opens on the other side. A man, a younger
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: crawls out. He is holding a two year old child in his hands. The child's coat is covered in blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stares at the shocked child and takes the rifle to her eye to shoot again. As she does, ERIK senses her movement and throws himself to the ground. Through the rifle viewfinder we see just a glimpse of ERIK and the red glare of the coat covered in blood, ERIK HELLER grabbing the child and sprinting for the forest,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: taking aim at HELLER, and then firing as HELLER dives into the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARISSA'S APARTMENT. VIRGINIA. USA - NIGHT 86 PRESENT DAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: puts on a pair of rubber kitchen gloves and sets fire to the file in the sink. When it's all burnt up she switches on the garbage disposal and pushes the ashen remains down the gurgler with a dish mop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOROCCAN DESERT - LATER 87 The sun has dipped a little now, the shadows of the dunes are longer, but the heat is still intense. HANNA's throat is parched by the dry heat, her pale eyes scorched by the angry sun. She walks purposefully but with a growing awareness of her tiny scale in this seemingly endless sea of sand. She has no conception of this landscape, no idea where she might be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I live in Leipzig. German city...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .7 Million people... I go to school at the Klaus Kohle Gymnasium... literature and sport... I have a dog called Trudi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: climbs a steep dune, eyes down, feet pounding. A shadow falls across her path and she looks up to see the shape of a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: standing at the top of the dune silhouetted by the sun. HANNA's hand goes to the concealed gun. The GIRL stares at HANNA. They must be about the same age but there the resemblance ends. HANNA, dusty, bloodied and bruised in military top, trousers and boots stares at this perfect image of western adolescence. Dressed head to toe in pink and drinking a can of coke, no concession to where she is whatsoever. This is SOPHIE LYALL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stares at her, then abruptly turns to walk in opposite direction until she sees another convoy of US military trucks in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns back. Looks at SOPHIE. Like a wary animal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you speak English?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is unsure how to speak to this strange person.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That can't be helped. You look terrible. At that moment SOPHIE'S brother, MILES, eight years old, rises over the dune and stands by SOPHIE'S side. In his hand is a stills camera, not digital, film. MILES stares at HANNA while talking to SOPHIE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAN. FERRY CAR DECK - DAY 111 MILES is sitting in the driver's seat, pretending to drive the stationary van. Through the windscreen, RACHEL and SEB can be seen having a heated discussion. In the back, HANNA is changing into some of SOPHIE'S clothes.

Her actions become progressively more frantic, relishing the destruction. She finds more and more photograph's of JOANNA. The photographs seem to have a driving effect on her. She walks down the hall and opens a door onto a small spare bedroom that had been turned into home office. Every available wall space is covered in newspaper clippings and photographs relating JOANNA'S murder. On the floor MARISSA finds a box of old casette tapes. She stops to inspect one of the tapes. A label reads: a Joanna no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DANISH HOSTEL - MORNING. 133 ERIK HELLER walks into a small, long-established family hotel on a Danish road near the coast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He is in the slightly dated suit he wore when he left the forest and looks a little dishevelled and odd. A sixtyish Danish woman stands behind the counter, scrutinising him. They speak in Danish with English subtitles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need a room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I stayed here fifteen years ago. It hasn't changed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't much like change here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither do I.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olsson. Peter Olsson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have some post. She turns and retrieves HANNA'S POSTCARD from the mail rack and hands it to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reads: aMission accomplisheda
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you heard about the manhunt? A man has killed two coastguards. Everybody is being asked to keep an eye out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what exactly?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. He smiles. She takes a closer look and notices goose fat smeared behind his ear.. and blood on a shirt cuff...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAN/SPANISH CAMPSITE - MORNING 134 The FAMILY have checked out and are leaving the campsite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long until you drop me off?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should have you there by dinner time. From Lille you can get a train to Berlin. Leipzig's just a few hours further.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and SOPHIE exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RECEPTION. SPANISH CAMPSITE - CONTINUOUS 135 The FAMILY van passes through the campsite gates to reveal
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: coming out of the reception hut. He sees the van, recognises it. He sees the kids in the back. Bingo. He runs to a black BMW where two of his HENCHMEN are waiting for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wake up. It's them. He jumps in the passenger seat whilst the driver revs the engine. The BMW pulls out in front of an oncoming truck narrowly avoiding a collision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ISAACS' BMW - CONTINUOUS 136 ISAACS holds onto the dash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DANISH HOSTEL - DAY 137 The RECEPTIONIST picks up the phone and dials.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that the police? Yes, I don't want to trouble you but I have a new guest you may wish to know about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VESTERBROGADE STATION/COPENHAGEN. DAY. 138 A commuter train pulls into the vast station. Amongst the morning commuters alighting the train is ERIK HELLER. He looks furtively around, and tries to blend in with the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - from a walkway above the station - someone is watching
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as he tries to conceal himself within the throng. A DANISH AGENT, hidden on a metal walkway above the platform. On the platform HELLER walks amongst the commuters, past the ticket collectors, past another DANISH AGENT posing as a commuter - he stops and lingers by him, noting something not right. He moves off and enters a small bar. The second AGENT immediately follows and from the walkway, the other rushes downstairs to give chase too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: walks through the bar into the toilets, finds a FIRE EXIT and walks out through it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GOODS YARD/VESTERBROGADE STATION - DAY 139 HELLER finds himself in a goods yard adjoining the train station. He walks through the goods yard, then suddenly, and apparently for no reason, stops dead, then throws himself behind a skip of empty bottles. As he does two new men, AMERICAN SPECIAL OPS, run round the corner into the goods yard. From the fire exit, the DANISH AGENTS EMERGE and after signalling to each other, head off to the perimeter. The various agents scour the yard. The SPECIAL OPS get closer to HELLER's hiding place. HELLER suddenly emerges from his hiding place and sticks an elbow in the face of one, a knee in the groin of another. There's a brief exchange of blows. One of the SPECIAL OPS draws his hand gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: produces a knife out of nowhere and launches at the man, cutting him on the hand, making him drop his gun. He stabs the other in the eye and the man falls to the ground squealing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: leans in and takes from the man's pocket his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: makes a run for it. One of the SPECIAL OPS lets off a shot, the bullet clipping HELLER in the leg. He falters but limps off behind the towering containers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FRENCH ROAD - DAY 140 The FAMILY van is making its way up through France.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Following in the black BMW, a few cars behind, ISAACS and his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are biding their time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAN/FRENCH ROAD - EVENING 141 RACHEL is driving, while HANNA rides in the front seat keeping her entertained.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...they can live at freezing temperatures for up to nine months without food. Imagine that, nine months.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you know so much about fleas?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I read it in my Encyclopaedia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is looking in the side view mirror. She sees ISAACS BMW and frowns, she's seen it before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Also, they can jump around 200 times their own body length, which makes them the best jumpers of all known animals except for the froghopper. Now they can really jump.

direction.raw_text: makes a turn and HANNA checks the side view mirror again. Yes, the BMW is still there. HANNA becomes anxious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think so. But HANNA'S face betrays her concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Mama, I know you're disappointed in me, I know it. I'm so sorry, Mama. But I have found maybe a way to make it better...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOTEL SUITE. COPENHAGEN - NIGHT 142 CLOSE ON - a portable casette machine playing one of the tapes MARISSA discovered at KATRIN ZADEK'S.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I'm in a program now... a program to make babies stronger. In an adjoining bathroom MARISSA, in a pair of cotton pyjamas, is brushing her teeth. Her lips pulled back in a snarl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) An American program. It's very scientific. Important scientific work. Still brushing MARISSA walks through to the tape machine and presses fast forward. Then play -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Erik says he can get these tapes to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bastard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) - He says I look beautiful. I don't feel beautiful...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: doesn't care, fast forwards. Play -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) ...I'm not sure if it's true that the baby can hear, but at night I sing. I hope it hears me.
